game_description: Wisdom is a breakthrough in science education that explains the effects of psychedelics on the brain within the predictive coding neuroscience framework. In Wisdom you can hold the psilocybin molecule and fit it into the receptor and you can even experience and understand how synesthesia happens. Donâ€™t forget to dance while you're learning!
review_1: Loved it! Beautiful visuals, interesting interactions, and a very educational narrative.
review_2: Highly creative piece of artful education with interactivity like dancing and "placing" a psilocybin molecule onto a receptor.
